text.data-name: In redeveloping the website navigation, using easy-to-understand terminology on the main navigation would increase the likelihood of finding information faster. This is the first iteration of the revised sitemap. In later testing, the word “public” in the
text.tspan: In redeveloping the website navigation, using easy-to-understand terminology on the
main navigation would increase the likelihood of finding information faster. This is the
first iteration of the revised sitemap. In later testing, the word “public” in the main
navigation was changed to “information resources” based on feedback.
